channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's $8B Military Pay Backstop Set to Expire
item.description: Military paychecks are again at risk as the stopgap $8 billion President Donald Trump redirected to cover troops' salaries during the government shutdown is projected to run out by Oct. 31 â€” leaving Congress with little time to act and escalating Republican pressure on Senate Democrats who blocked a GOP bill to guarantee military pay.
